'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The operator of a trading post on [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/), with supplies of varying types.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Tools, explosives, and the unique [Magnificent Escape Cape](/magnificentEscapeCape/).
